title: Convert Local Time to UTC
description: This function converts a given local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) based on the provided time zone offset and considers Daylight Saving Time (DST) if applicable.
name: LTIME_TO_UTC

input.name: LOCAL_TIME
input.description: The local time to be converted to UTC.

input.name: DST
input.description: A boolean flag indicating if Daylight Saving Time should be considered.

input.name: TIME_ZONE_OFFSET
input.description: The offset of the local time from UTC in minutes.
